meanings.definition: Something given or received without charge or obligation.
meanings.sent1: I got a freebee at the store today.
meanings.sent2: The company offered a freebee to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: The freebee from the event made my day.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a freebee, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The freebee was like a little surprise waiting for me.

meanings.sent1: She received a lovely freebee on her birthday.
meanings.sent2: The children were excited to get a freebee with their meal.
meanings.sent3: The freebee was like a cherry on top of the day.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was a freebee that lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The freebee felt like a small treasure in her hands.

meanings.definition: To give or receive something without charge.
meanings.sent1: I decided to freebee some clothes to those in need.
meanings.sent2: They always freebee snacks during movie nights.
meanings.sent3: He tried to freebee his way into the party.
meanings.sent4: She would freebee her time to help others in the community.
meanings.sent5: The organization would often freebee food to the homeless.
